spec_data.Name: perl-Directory-Queue
spec_data.Description:
The goal of this module is to offer a simple queue system using the
underlying file system for storage, security and to prevent race conditions
via atomic operations. It focuses on simplicity, robustness and
scalability.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 11:07:00 AM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Object oriented interface to a directory based queue
